description: This JSON Schema describes the entire acquisition process during an SEM_FIB_Tomography measurement.  The acquisition comprises of multiple datasets which are described using the schema located at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/main/SEM-FIB_Tomography/SEM_FIB_Tomography_acquisition_Dataset_Schema.json. The images in each dataset is taken using a detector (SE, BSE, EDS, EBSD) using a specific configuration. Each image is described by the schema located at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/main/SEM-FIB_Tomography/SEM_FIB_Tomography_acquisition_Image_Schema.json. The units are by default to be considered as the SI units unless otherwise specified
title: acquisition_main

acquisition.description: This level is the root element of the schema. It contains all the metadata describing an acquisition as part of an SEM/FIB Tomography measurement which might include multiple detectors.

genericMetadata.description: Describes all the generic metadata common to the acquisition

technique.description: (Required) - Any experimental, theoretical or computational method used during Data Acquisition or during any of the processes included in the Data Analysis Lifecycle to acquire, process or analyse Research Data about a System or a set of them with an Instrument, which is used to generate this metadata.

measurementPurpose.description: (Required) - Measurement is experimental Data Acquisition, typically performed on a Sample using an experimental Technique. It may also be performed during Fabrication or Sample Preparation, e.g., to characterise the intermediate stages and/or the final resulting Precursor(s) or Sample(s), respectively. A Measurement may require the use of Consumables.
enum: completeness check (presence or absence of given properties)
correlative characterization (dedicated sample treatment to emphasise given features)
test specific hypothesis (focus only on given aspects)

equipment.description: (Optional) - Any kind of physical or virtual item, device, machine or other tools used to perform one or more Fabrication(s), Sample Preparation(s), Model Preparation(s), Data Acquisition(s) and/or any of the processes included in the Data Analysis Lifecycle. Usually, the Equipment is located in a Laboratory hosted by an Institution and/or can be virtually or remotely accessed. Equipment is usually an investment. According to this definition, an Instrument is a particular type of Equipment.

consumables.description: (Optional) - Auxiliary entity used during Fabrication, Sample Preparation or Measurement which has a limited time capacity or is limited in its number of uses before it is disposed of, necessary to the process itself and normally bought from third party manufacturers. Examples are: gloves, syringes, wipes, etching solutions, glass slides, spatulas, weighing paper, two-sided tape.

parents.description: (Required) - Parents of this metadata like the metadata document of the sample with which the measurement was performed.

parentReference.description: If type is 'MetaStore URI' it is possible to easily fill this field in a later stage

program.description: (Optional)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

applicationID.description: (Optional)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

fileVersion.description: The file version of the measurement data of the project

projectName.description: The name of the project containing the acquistion datasets

projectID.description: (Optional)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

projectDescription.description: Description about the project containing the acquistion datasets

userDescription.description: Additional description provided by the user about the measurement or the sample

zCutSpacing.description: The spacing between individual slices in z dimension

millingLocationHeight.description: The total height of the area which is cut into slices in the z dimension

millingLocationWidth.description: The total width of the area which is cut into slices in the x dimension

millingLocationDepth.description: The total width of the area which is cut into slices in the y dimension

millingLocationX.description: X coordinate begin of the milling location from the origin.

millingLocationY.description: Y coordinate of the begin of the milling location from the origin.

millingCurrent.description: The total height of the area which is cut into slices in the z dimension. IRI: https://purls.helmholtz-metadaten.de/EMG/00000003

numberOfCuts.description: The number of slices into which the sample is cut during the course of the SEM/FIB Tomography

pump.description: The name of the pump used in the instrument

column.description: The name of the column used in the instrument

source.description: The type of the source used in the instrument. The source is a physical part of an electron or ion microscope from which the particles that form the beam are emitted. IRI: https://purls.helmholtz-metadaten.de/EMG/00000021

eucentricWorkingDistance.description: The Working Distance when the smaple is at the eucentric height

ESEM.description: To be set to true if environmental SEM is used

systemType.description: Describes the system type used - the name of the instrument

angleToEBeam.description: (Optional) - angle between e-beam and i-beam defined separately as angleDetails (Allowed units: degree, radian). It is specified by the manufacturer and a property of the geometry of the instrument.

stage.description: The dimensions of the stage used in the instrument

dataset.description: Array of all the dataset-metadata acquired using multiple detectors

program.description: (Optional) - Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition.

programName.description: (Optional) - Name of the program (or software) used for acquisition

identifierValue.description: (Optional) - String containing the value of an identifier

identifierType.description: (Optional) - Type of the identifier to be selected from: *ROR *GRID *ISNI *URL *DOI *Handle *String

distanceDetails.description: (Optional) - Describes a distance, size or length.

value.description: (Required) - Value of the distance, size or length.

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (nm, Âµm, mm, cm, m).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum).

unit.description: (Optional) - the unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (pA, nA, uA, mA, A).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - A qualifier to describe the value (e.g., avg, max, min).

value.description: (Required) - The angle expressed as an integer or floating point value.

unit.description: (Optional) - the unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (degree, radian).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - A qualifier to describe the value (e.g., avg, max, min)
